article.headline: Wyoming 77, Colorado St. 67
article.story: FORT COLLINS, Colo. (AP) -- Joseph Tayor scored a career high 21 points as Wyoming handed Colorado State its 14th straight loss with a 77-67 victory Wednesday night. Colorado State's losing streak matches an 88-year school record set when the Rams lost the final 12 games of the 1918-1919 season and the first two games of the 1919-20 campaign. Tyson Johnson added 17 points for Wyoming (11-16, 4-10 Mountain West). The Cowboys ended its three-game losing streak and won for only the second time in seven road games. Willis Gardner led Colorado State (6-21, 0-13) Mountain West with 16 points. The Rams also suffered their 14th consecutive conference losses. Their win came when they defeated Wyoming 86-68 on Feb. 24, 2007. Stuart Creason's layup off a feed from Marcus Walker capped a 9-0 to start the second half and put the Rams ahead 41-28. But Wyoming went on a 10-0 run midway through the half and took the lead, 50-47 on Eric Platt's 3-pointer with 8:12 left. Walker's pointer with 7:18 to play tied the game, 52-52. Brad Jones broke the tie with a short jump shot and the second of two straight jumpers by Taylor made it 62-55 with 2:54 left. Colorado State took a 32-28 lead into halftime after once leading 29-12 with 7:07 left. Johnson scored seven points as the Cowboys finished the half with a 16-3 run.

statistics.name: points
statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: fieldGoals
statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.name: freeThrows
statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
